short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI assistant for learning and surfing websites. Tell the butler what to do with the content and you will get a response.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Butler AI is the ultimate solution for all your text-related needs. Whether you're working on a project for work, school, or just for fun, this advanced AI tool can help you streamline your tasks with ease. Select the text you want to work with and let The Butler AI do the rest.
